name: Nottingham
description:
Nottingham is a simple game game by a team of two in less than 72 hours for Ludum Dare 45. The theme was Start with nothing.

You start with nothing and have to collect golden goblets to progress to next level. To spice things up, there will be lava, spikes and ghosts on your merry way. Sometimes, doors will be on your way to the goblet and keys will need to be found. Keys can open doors with same color as the key.

To play, use WASD or arrows to move and mouse to look around.

Good luck and thanks for playing!
